welcome.description:
Welcome to a space that meticulously reproduces the beauty and abundance of the Joseon Dynasty, where players of all genres gather to live life in their own way. Emphasizing realism, everything from the architectural styles to the nuances of daily life during that era has been carefully crafted.

Embark on a unique and captivating journey that you have never experienced before. A new story that will guide you is already unfolding here.

passwordDisclaimer.1: Your password is sent directly to mojang and never stored.
passwordDisclaimer.2: {appName} is not affiliated with Mojang AB.

install.javaMessage: In order to launch Minecraft, you need a 64-bit installation of Java {major}. Would you like us to install a copy?

required.message:
A valid x64 installation of Java {major} is required to launch.

Please refer to our Java Management Guide for instructions on how to manually install Java.

downloadJava.javaDownloadCorruptedError: Downloaded JDK has a bad hash, the file may be corrupted.

dlAsync.unableToLoadDistributionIndex: Could not load a copy of the distribution index. See the console (CTRL + Shift + i) for more details.
dlAsync.seeConsoleForDetails: See console (CTRL + Shift + i) for more details.
dlAsync.gameDuringErrorTitle: The game has ended due to an error.
dlAsync.launchWrapperNotDownloaded:
The main file, LaunchWrapper, failed to download properly. As a result, the game cannot launch.

To fix this issue, temporarily turn off your antivirus software and launch the game again.

If you have time, please submit an issue and let us know what antivirus software you use. We'll contact them and try to straighten things out.
dlAsync.checkConsoleForDetails: Please check the console (CTRL + Shift + i) for more details.

notAccessMods.title: An unavailable mode was found!
notAccessMods.desc:
The following modes are not available:
{mods}

If you think this mod is needed, please let Make The World know that it is.

header.desc: Add new accounts or manage existing ones.

logout.lastAccountWarningMessage:
In order to use the launcher you must be logged into at least one account. You will need to login again after.

Are you sure you want to log out?

minecraft.autoConnect: Automatically connect to the server on launch.

launchDetached.title: Launch game process detached from launcher.
launchDetached.desc: If the game is not detached, closing the launcher will also close the game.

memory.title: Memory
memory.desc: The recommended minimum RAM is 3 gigabytes. Setting the minimum and maximum values to the same value may reduce lag.

java.execDesc: The Java executable is validated before game launch.

jvm.optsDesc: Options to be provided to the JVM at runtime. -Xms and -Xmx should not be included.

header.desc: Options related to the launcher itself.

dataDirectory.title: Data Directory
dataDirectory.desc:
All game files and local Java installations will be stored in the data directory.
Screenshots and world saves are stored in the instance folder for the corresponding server configuration.

launcherOpen.title: Whether to show the launcher when a game is running
launcherOpen.desc: Sets whether the Launcher should be displayed after the game is launched.

gameLogOpen.title: Open the Output Log when the game starts
gameLogOpen.desc: Settings for the output log when the game starts.

trayMove.title: Go to the tray
trayMove.desc: The Launcher continues to run when you close it, and you can exit it from the tray.

header.desc: View information and release notes for the current version.
Download, install, and review updates for the launcher.

update.downloadButton: Download from GitHubClose the launcher and run the dmg to update.
update.latestVersionTitle: You Are Running the Latest Version
update.moveMsStore: Go to the store and update

login.errorMessage: Microsoft authentication failed. Please try again.

logout.errorMessage: Microsoft logout failed. Please try again.

validateAccount.failedMessage: We were unable to refresh the login for {account}. Please select another account or login again.
validateAccount.failedMessageSelectAnotherAccount: We were unable to refresh the login for {account}. Please login again.

startup.messageDefault:
A connection could not be established to our servers to download the distribution index. No local copies were available to load.

The distribution index is an essential file which provides the latest server information. The launcher is unable to start without it. Ensure you are connected to the internet and relaunch the application.
startup.messageOther: An error occurred while loading the launcher. If you see this error even after reinstalling the launcher, please report it to Make The World.

checkInternet.title: Check your internet connection
checkInternet.desc:
Internet is required to use the launcher
Please check your internet connection.

microphone.title: Microphone permission denied
microphone.message: You can't use the in-game microphone because microphone permissions are denied.
